sqlMap.select: SELECT t.CUST_ORG_NO, t.CUST_ORG_NAME, t.UNIT_ID, t.UNIT_NAME, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN t.TAR_CODE='TE_00003' THEN t.TAR_VALUE END),0) AS BANK_ALL_INFLOW, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN t.TAR_CODE='TE_00004' THEN t.TAR_VALUE END),0) AS BANK_SPECIAL_INFLOW, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN t.TAR_CODE='TE_00034' THEN t.TAR_VALUE END),0) AS BANK_ALL_OUTFLOW, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN t.TAR_CODE='TE_00035' THEN t.TAR_VALUE END),0) AS BANK_SPECIAL_OUTFLOW, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN t.TAR_CODE='TE_00067' THEN t.TAR_VALUE END),0) AS BANK_ALL_NETFLOW FROM ( SELECT c.BANK_ID CUST_ORG_NO, c.BANK_NAME CUST_ORG_NAME, c.BANK_TYPE CUST_ORG_TYPE, u.UNIT_ID, u.UNIT_NAME, q.TAR_CODE, q.TAR_VALUE FROM pfm_financial_institution c LEFT JOIN pfm_tm_qty_financial_institution q ON q.BANK_ID = c.BANK_ID AND q.TAR_CODE IN ('TE_00003', 'TE_00004', 'TE_00034', 'TE_00035', 'TE_00067' ) AND q.ORG_ID = #unitId# and q.TAR_DATE = #dataDate# LEFT JOIN SYS_UNIT u ON u.UNIT_ID = q.ORG_ID WHERE 1=1 AND c.BANK_ID in ('100000','100001','100002','100003','100004','100005','100007','100018','100028','100030','100050','100055') )t GROUP BY t.CUST_ORG_NO,t.CUST_ORG_NAME,t.UNIT_ID,t.UNIT_NAME ORDER BY t.CUST_ORG_TYPE

SELECT DISTINCT d.TAR_CODE, d.TAR_NAME, IFNULL(q.TAR_VALUE,0) TAR_VALUE FROM PFM_TM_QTY_DEF d LEFT JOIN PFM_TM_QTY_ORG q ON d.TAR_CODE = q.TAR_CODE AND q.ORG_ID = #unitId# and q.TAR_DATE = #dataDate# WHERE d.TAR_STATUS = '1' and d.TAR_CODE IN ('TE_00011', 'TE_00012', 'TE_00013', 'TE_00117', 'TE_00043', 'TE_00044', 'TE_00045', 'TE_00118', 'TE_00110', 'TE_00111', 'TE_00112', 'TE_00113')

SELECT DISTINCT d.TAR_CODE, d.TAR_NAME, q.TAR_VALUE FROM PFM_TM_QTY_DEF d LEFT JOIN PFM_TM_QTY_ORG q ON d.TAR_CODE = q.TAR_CODE AND q.ORG_ID = #unitId# and q.TAR_DATE = #dataDate# WHERE d.TAR_STATUS = '1' and d.TAR_CODE IN ('TE_00069', 'TE_00070', 'TE_00071', 'TE_00072', 'TE_00073', 'TE_00074', 'TE_00075', 'TE_00076', 'TE_00077', 'TE_00078', 'TE_00079', 'TE_00080', 'TE_00081', 'TE_00089', 'TE_00090', 'TE_00091', 'TE_00092', 'TE_00093', 'TE_00094', 'TE_00095', 'TE_00096', 'TE_00097', 'TE_00098', 'TE_00099', 'TE_00100', 'TE_00101', 'TE_00102', 'TE_00103')

select unit_id , unit_name, #dataDate# dateTime, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00069' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00069, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00070' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00070, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00071' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00071, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00072' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00072, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00073' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00073, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00074' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00074, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00075' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00075, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00076' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00076, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00077' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00077, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00078' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00078, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00079' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00079, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00080' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00080, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00081' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00081, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00089' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00089, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00090' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00090, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00091' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00091, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00092' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00092, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00093' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00093, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00094' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00094, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00095' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00095, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00096' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00096, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00097' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00097, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00098' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00098, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00099' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00099, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00100' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00100, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00101' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00101, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00102' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00102, sum(CASE WHEN tar_code='TE_00103' THEN tar_value ELSE 0 end) TE_00103 from ( SELECT DISTINCT su.UNIT_ID, su.UNIT_NAME, d.TAR_CODE, d.TAR_NAME, q.TAR_VALUE FROM PFM_TM_QTY_DEF d LEFT JOIN PFM_TM_QTY_ORG q ON d.TAR_CODE = q.TAR_CODE left join sys_unit su on su.UNIT_ID = q.ORG_ID and su.START_DATE <= #dataDate# and su.END_DATE >= #dataDate# AND q.ORG_ID = #unitId# and q.TAR_DATE = #dataDate# WHERE d.TAR_STATUS = '1' and d.TAR_CODE IN ('TE_00069', 'TE_00070', 'TE_00071', 'TE_00072', 'TE_00073', 'TE_00074', 'TE_00075', 'TE_00076', 'TE_00077', 'TE_00078', 'TE_00079', 'TE_00080', 'TE_00081', 'TE_00089', 'TE_00090', 'TE_00091', 'TE_00092', 'TE_00093', 'TE_00094', 'TE_00095', 'TE_00096', 'TE_00097', 'TE_00098', 'TE_00099', 'TE_00100', 'TE_00101', 'TE_00102', 'TE_00103') )a

SELECT sub_code, sub_name, IFNULL(amt_month_c,0) /100000000 amt_month_c, IFNULL(amt_year_c,0)/100000000 amt_year_c, IFNULL(annual_growth_rate_c,0)*100 annual_growth_rate_c, IFNULL(amt_month_L,0)/100000000 amt_month_L, IFNULL(amt_year_L,0)/100000000 amt_year_L, IFNULL(annual_growth_rate_L,0)*100 annual_growth_rate_L, IFNULL(amt_month_T,0)/100000000 amt_month_T, IFNULL(annual_growth_rate_T,0)*100 annual_growth_rate_T FROM bat_rpt_budget_stat_m_his T WHERE T.TAR_DATE = #dataDate#
